rafi-eitan.bio: Israeli intelligence officer (1926-2019). Former head of LAKAM, the Israeli scientific intelligence unit. Handler of spy Jonathan Pollard. Named by investigative journalists as having links to the Robert Maxwell intelligence network that some believe was connected to Epstein.

thierry-mugler.name: Thierry Mugler
thierry-mugler.bio: French fashion designer (1948-2022). Named in Epstein's contacts through Paris fashion connections.

karl-lagerfeld-ep.name: Karl Lagerfeld
karl-lagerfeld-ep.bio: German fashion designer (1933-2019). Creative director of Chanel. Named in Epstein's contacts. One of the most influential fashion figures of the 20th and 21st centuries.

jean-paul-gaultier.name: Jean-Paul Gaultier
jean-paul-gaultier.bio: French fashion designer. Named in Epstein's contacts through Paris social circles.

alain-delon.name: Alain Delon
alain-delon.bio: French actor (1935-2024). One of the most famous French actors. Named in Epstein's black book among Paris contacts.

nicolas-sarkozy-ep.name: Nicolas Sarkozy
nicolas-sarkozy-ep.bio: Former President of France (2007-2012). Named in Epstein's contacts. Part of the political elite that Epstein cultivated international connections with.

carla-bruni.name: Carla Bruni
carla-bruni.bio: Italian-French supermodel and singer. Wife of Nicolas Sarkozy. Named in Epstein's black book.

princess-olga.name: Princess Olga of Greece
princess-olga.bio: Member of the Greek royal family. Named in Epstein's contacts as part of European royalty connections.

ken-mapp.name: Kenneth Mapp
ken-mapp.bio: Former Governor of the U.S. Virgin Islands (2015-2019). Succeeded John de Jongh. The USVI government under his administration continued to provide tax benefits to Epstein's companies despite his sex offender status.

albert-bryan-jr.name: Albert Bryan Jr.
albert-bryan-jr.bio: Governor of the U.S. Virgin Islands (2019-present). Under his administration, the USVI filed the landmark lawsuit against Epstein's estate and later against JPMorgan and Deutsche Bank.

cathy-alexander.name: Cathy Alexander
cathy-alexander.bio: Administrative assistant who worked for Epstein's Southern Trust Company in the U.S. Virgin Islands. Testified about the company's operations and Epstein's activities on the islands.

alan-howard.name: Alan Howard
alan-howard.bio: British billionaire hedge fund manager. Co-founder of Brevan Howard. Named in Epstein's contacts.

david-bonderman.name: David Bonderman
david-bonderman.bio: American billionaire private equity investor (1942-2023). Co-founder of TPG Capital. Named in Epstein's contacts.

michael-price-ep.name: Michael Price
michael-price-ep.bio: American value investor and hedge fund manager. Named in Epstein's black book.

andrew-tisch.name: Andrew Tisch
andrew-tisch.bio: American billionaire businessman. Co-chairman of Loews Corporation. Part of the Tisch family. Named in Epstein's contacts.

larry-tisch.name: Larry Tisch
larry-tisch.bio: American billionaire businessman (1923-2003). Former CEO of CBS and co-chairman of Loews Corporation. Named in Epstein's contacts.

jonathan-tisch.name: Jonathan Tisch
jonathan-tisch.bio: American billionaire businessman. Co-owner of the New York Giants. Chairman of Loews Hotels. Named in Epstein's contacts.

joe-lewis-ep.name: Joe Lewis
joe-lewis-ep.bio: British billionaire businessman. Owner of Tottenham Hotspur FC. Named in Epstein's contacts. Later convicted of insider trading in 2023.

peter-cohen.name: Peter Cohen
peter-cohen.bio: American financier. Former CEO of Shearson Lehman Brothers. Named in Epstein's contacts.

james-wolfensohn-ep.name: James Wolfensohn
james-wolfensohn-ep.bio: Australian-American banker (1933-2020). Former President of the World Bank. Named in Epstein's contacts.

terry-mcauliffe.name: Terry McAuliffe
terry-mcauliffe.bio: American politician and businessman. Former Governor of Virginia and DNC Chairman. Named in Epstein's contacts through Clinton political circles.

john-podesta.name: John Podesta
john-podesta.bio: American political consultant. White House Chief of Staff under Clinton, counselor to Obama, senior adviser to Biden. Named in Epstein's contacts.

david-rockefeller.name: David Rockefeller
david-rockefeller.bio: American banker and philanthropist (1915-2017). Former chairman of Chase Manhattan Bank. Named in Epstein's contacts. Last surviving grandson of John D. Rockefeller.

laurance-rockefeller.name: Laurance Rockefeller
laurance-rockefeller.bio: American businessman, philanthropist, and conservationist (1910-2004). Named in Epstein's contacts. Grandson of John D. Rockefeller.

pamela-harriman.name: Pamela Harriman
pamela-harriman.bio: British-born American political figure and diplomat (1920-1997). U.S. Ambassador to France. Named in Epstein's contacts (pre-mortem entries). Major Democratic fundraiser.

charlie-sheen.name: Charlie Sheen
charlie-sheen.bio: American actor. Named in Epstein's contacts.

clint-eastwood-ep.name: Clint Eastwood
clint-eastwood-ep.bio: American actor and filmmaker. Named in Epstein's contacts.

john-travolta-ep.name: John Travolta
john-travolta-ep.bio: American actor and pilot. Named in Epstein's black book.

oprah-winfrey-ep.name: Oprah Winfrey
oprah-winfrey-ep.bio: American talk show host, media executive, and billionaire. Named in Epstein's contacts.

steven-spielberg-ep.name: Steven Spielberg
steven-spielberg-ep.bio: American filmmaker. Named in Epstein's contacts. Director of Schindler's List, Jaws, E.T., and many more. One of the most successful filmmakers in history.

george-lucas-ep.name: George Lucas
george-lucas-ep.bio: American filmmaker. Creator of Star Wars and Indiana Jones. Named in Epstein's contacts.

ron-howard-ep.name: Ron Howard
ron-howard-ep.bio: American filmmaker and actor. Director and producer. Named in Epstein's contacts through Brian Grazer's Imagine Entertainment.

mike-nichols.name: Mike Nichols
mike-nichols.bio: German-American film and theater director (1931-2014). Director of The Graduate. Named in Epstein's black book. Husband of Diane Sawyer (also in book).

barbara-streisand-ep.name: Barbra Streisand
barbara-streisand-ep.bio: American singer, actress, and filmmaker. Named in Epstein's contacts.

joan-collins-ep.name: Joan Collins
joan-collins-ep.bio: British-American actress. Star of Dynasty. Named in Epstein's black book.

michael-douglas-ep.name: Michael Douglas
michael-douglas-ep.bio: American actor and producer. Named in Epstein's contacts.

catherine-zeta-jones-ep.name: Catherine Zeta-Jones
catherine-zeta-jones-ep.bio: Welsh actress. Named in Epstein's contacts alongside husband Michael Douglas.

paul-mccartney-ep.name: Paul McCartney
paul-mccartney-ep.bio: British musician. Member of the Beatles. Named in Epstein's black book. Father of Stella McCartney (also listed).

eric-clapton-ep.name: Eric Clapton
eric-clapton-ep.bio: British musician and guitarist. Named in Epstein's black book.

mick-fleetwood-ep.name: Mick Fleetwood
mick-fleetwood-ep.bio: British musician. Co-founder of Fleetwood Mac. Named in Epstein's contacts.

rod-stewart-ep.name: Rod Stewart
rod-stewart-ep.bio: British-American singer. Named in Epstein's black book.

sting-ep.name: Sting
sting-ep.bio: British musician. Former lead singer of The Police. Named in Epstein's contacts.

bono-ep.name: Bono
bono-ep.bio: Irish musician. Lead singer of U2. Named in Epstein's contacts.

adam-dell.name: Adam Dell
adam-dell.bio: American venture capitalist. Brother of Michael Dell. Named in Epstein's contacts.

nello-balan.name: Nello Balan
nello-balan.bio: Italian-born New York restaurateur. Owner of Nello restaurant on Madison Avenue, a power spot frequented by Epstein and his social circle.

peter-marino.name: Peter Marino
peter-marino.bio: American architect. Known for designing luxury retail stores (Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Dior). Named in Epstein's contacts through New York social and real estate circles.

thierry-despont.name: Thierry Despont
thierry-despont.bio: French-American architect and designer. Designed interiors for some of the world's wealthiest people. Named in Epstein's contacts.

jordana-friedman.name: Jordana Friedman
jordana-friedman.bio: Managed victims' claims for the Epstein Victims' Compensation Fund administered by Kenneth Feinberg. The fund paid out over $121 million to more than 135 claimants.

ken-feinberg.name: Kenneth Feinberg
ken-feinberg.bio: American attorney. Special Master who administered the Jeffrey Epstein Victims' Compensation Fund. Previously administered the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund and BP oil spill fund. The Epstein fund paid out approximately $121 million to over 135 claimants before closing.

bob-menendez.name: Bob Menendez
bob-menendez.bio: American politician. U.S. Senator from New Jersey. Named in Epstein's contacts. Later convicted of corruption charges in 2024 in an unrelated case.

barney-frank.name: Barney Frank
barney-frank.bio: American politician. Former U.S. Representative from Massachusetts. Named in Epstein's contacts.

prince-michael-kent.name: Prince Michael of Kent
prince-michael-kent.bio: British royal and first cousin of Queen Elizabeth II. Named in Epstein's contacts. Part of the British royal family circle connected through Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell.

mohammed-al-fayed.name: Mohamed Al-Fayed
mohammed-al-fayed.bio: Egyptian-born businessman (1929-2023). Former owner of Harrods and Fulham FC. Father of Dodi Fayed. Named in Epstein's contacts. After his death, over 100 women came forward with sexual assault allegations against him.

evgeny-lebedev.name: Evgeny Lebedev
evgeny-lebedev.bio: Russian-British media proprietor. Owner of The Independent and London Evening Standard. Son of Russian oligarch Alexander Lebedev. Named in Epstein's contacts through London social circles.

gerald-marie.name: Gerald Marie
gerald-marie.bio: French model agent. Former head of Elite Model Management in Europe. Accused of rape by multiple models. Close associate of Jean-Luc Brunel. Part of the modeling industry predator network that overlapped with Epstein's pipeline. Died 2024.

paolo-zampolli.name: Paolo Zampolli
paolo-zampolli.bio: Italian-American modeling agent. Founder of ID Model Management. Introduced Melania Knauss to Donald Trump. Named in Epstein's contacts through the New York modeling world.

robert-zimmer.name: Robert Zimmer
robert-zimmer.bio: American mathematician (1947-2023). Former President of the University of Chicago. Epstein donated to the university and maintained contacts with its leadership.

lee-bollinger.name: Lee Bollinger
lee-bollinger.bio: American attorney and academic. Former President of Columbia University. Named in Epstein's contacts.

ruth-simmons.name: Ruth Simmons
ruth-simmons.bio: American academic administrator. Former President of Brown University and Prairie View A&M. Named in Epstein's contacts through academic philanthropy circles.

geraldo-rivera-ep.name: Geraldo Rivera
geraldo-rivera-ep.bio: American journalist and talk show host. Named in Epstein's contacts.

maria-bartiromo.name: Maria Bartiromo
maria-bartiromo.bio: American television journalist. Fox Business anchor. Named in Epstein's contacts.

chris-cuomo-ep.name: Chris Cuomo
chris-cuomo-ep.bio: American television journalist. Former CNN anchor. Named in Epstein's contacts through his brother Andrew Cuomo and New York circles.

larry-king-ep.name: Larry King
larry-king-ep.bio: American television and radio host (1933-2021). Named in Epstein's black book.

connie-chung-ep.name: Connie Chung
connie-chung-ep.bio: American television journalist. Former CBS and CNN anchor. Named in Epstein's contacts.

anshu-jain.name: Anshu Jain
anshu-jain.bio: Indian-born British banker (1963-2022). Former Co-CEO of Deutsche Bank. Under his leadership, Deutsche Bank took on Epstein as a client after JPMorgan dropped him in 2013.

john-cryan.name: John Cryan
john-cryan.bio: British-Australian banker. Former CEO of Deutsche Bank (2015-2018). Under his watch, the bank continued to service Epstein despite increasing red flags.

charles-bronfman-ep.name: Charles Bronfman
charles-bronfman-ep.bio: Canadian-American businessman and philanthropist. Co-founder of Birthright Israel. Named in Epstein's contacts through Jewish philanthropic circles. Brother of Edgar Bronfman Sr.

andrew-farkas.name: Andrew Farkas
andrew-farkas.bio: American real estate developer. Founder of Island Capital Group. Named in Epstein's contacts through New York real estate.

ben-lambert.name: Ben Lambert
ben-lambert.bio: American real estate executive. Named in Epstein's black book. Part of New York commercial real estate circles.

niklas-zennstrom.name: Niklas Zennstrom
niklas-zennstrom.bio: Swedish-born entrepreneur. Co-founder of Skype. Named in Epstein's contacts.

eli-broad.name: Eli Broad
eli-broad.bio: American billionaire philanthropist (1933-2021). Co-founded KB Home and SunAmerica. Built the Broad Museum in Los Angeles. Named in Epstein's contacts.

francois-de-menil.name: Francois de Menil
francois-de-menil.bio: American architect and art patron. Member of the de Menil family, major art collectors. Named in Epstein's contacts.

dakis-joannou.name: Dakis Joannou
dakis-joannou.bio: Cypriot industrialist and art collector. One of the world's most prominent contemporary art collectors. Named in Epstein's contacts.

david-zwirner.name: David Zwirner
david-zwirner.bio: German-American art dealer. Founder of the David Zwirner gallery empire. Named in Epstein's contacts.

james-clapper.name: James Clapper
james-clapper.bio: Former Director of National Intelligence (2010-2017). Broader intelligence community connections to the Epstein case have been investigated by journalists, particularly questions about whether intelligence agencies had knowledge of or involvement in Epstein's activities.

john-brennan.name: John Brennan
john-brennan.bio: Former CIA Director (2013-2017). Questions about intelligence community knowledge of Epstein's activities have included the CIA, given Robert Maxwell's alleged Mossad connections and claims by Ari Ben-Menashe.

jennifer-araoz.name: Jennifer Araoz
jennifer-araoz.bio: Epstein victim and accuser. Testified she was recruited outside her Manhattan high school at age 14 in 2001 and repeatedly abused by Epstein at his townhouse. Filed one of the first lawsuits after New York changed its statute of limitations for sexual assault. Has spoken publicly about her experience, including testifying before Congress.

juliette-bryant.name: Juliette Bryant
juliette-bryant.bio: South African model and Epstein victim. Alleged she was trafficked to multiple countries by Epstein and Maxwell. Claimed she was abused at Epstein's properties in New York, the Caribbean, and Africa.

keith-raniere.name: Keith Raniere
keith-raniere.bio: American cult leader and convicted sex trafficker. Founder of NXIVM. Sentenced to 120 years in prison. Clare Bronfman (daughter of Edgar Bronfman Sr., who was in Epstein's black book) was a major NXIVM funder and was also convicted. The NXIVM and Epstein cases exposed overlapping patterns of elite trafficking networks.

clare-bronfman.name: Clare Bronfman
clare-bronfman.bio: American-Canadian heiress. Daughter of Edgar Bronfman Sr. (Seagram, WJC - in Epstein's black book). Major financial backer of NXIVM cult. Sentenced to over 6 years in federal prison for racketeering in 2020. Her case represented an intersection of two major trafficking scandals.

salman-rushdie-ep.name: Salman Rushdie
salman-rushdie-ep.bio: British-American novelist. Author of "The Satanic Verses." Named in Epstein's contacts.

tom-wolfe-ep.name: Tom Wolfe
tom-wolfe-ep.bio: American author and journalist (1930-2018). Named in Epstein's contacts.

john-mack.name: John Mack
john-mack.bio: American businessman. Former CEO and Chairman of Morgan Stanley. Named in Epstein's contacts.

richard-fuld.name: Richard Fuld
richard-fuld.bio: American banker. Former CEO of Lehman Brothers (led the firm into the largest bankruptcy in US history). Named in Epstein's contacts.

vikram-pandit.name: Vikram Pandit
vikram-pandit.bio: Indian-American banker. Former CEO of Citigroup. Named in Epstein's contacts.

manolo-blahnik.name: Manolo Blahnik
manolo-blahnik.bio: Spanish fashion designer. Creator of luxury shoe brand Manolo Blahnik. Named in Epstein's contacts.

roberto-cavalli.name: Roberto Cavalli
roberto-cavalli.bio: Italian fashion designer (1940-2024). Named in Epstein's contacts.

andre-leon-talley.name: Andre Leon Talley
andre-leon-talley.bio: American fashion journalist (1948-2022). Former creative director of Vogue. Named in Epstein's contacts.

michael-bloomberg-ep.name: Michael Bloomberg
michael-bloomberg-ep.bio: American billionaire businessman and politician. Founder of Bloomberg LP. Former three-term Mayor of New York City. Named in Epstein's black book. Donated to Epstein-linked MIT programs. One of the richest people in the world.

brian-roberts-comcast.name: Brian Roberts
brian-roberts-comcast.bio: American businessman. Chairman and CEO of Comcast Corporation (owner of NBCUniversal). Born 1959 to a Jewish family. Son of Comcast founder Ralph Roberts.

herb-allen.name: Herbert Allen Jr.
herb-allen.bio: American investment banker. President of Allen & Company. Host of the annual Sun Valley conference, the most exclusive gathering of media and tech moguls. Named in Epstein's black book.

barry-sternlicht.name: Barry Sternlicht
barry-sternlicht.bio: American billionaire businessman. Founder of Starwood Capital Group and creator of the W Hotels brand. Named in Epstein's black book.

richard-plepler.name: Richard Plepler
richard-plepler.bio: American media executive. Former chairman and CEO of HBO. Named in Epstein's black book. Led HBO through its golden age of prestige television.

tim-jefferies.name: Tim Jefferies
tim-jefferies.bio: British socialite, art dealer, and former model agency owner. Named in Epstein's black book. Part of the London social scene connected through Ghislaine Maxwell.

paul-allen-ep.name: Paul Allen
paul-allen-ep.bio: American billionaire (1953-2018). Co-founder of Microsoft. Named in Epstein's contacts. Owner of the Seattle Seahawks and Portland Trail Blazers. One of the wealthiest people in history.

ivanka-trump-ep.name: Ivanka Trump
ivanka-trump-ep.bio: American businesswoman and political figure. Daughter of Donald Trump. Named in Epstein's contacts. Flew on Epstein's plane as a teenager according to flight logs.

jared-kushner-ep.name: Jared Kushner
jared-kushner-ep.bio: American businessman and political figure. Son of Charles Kushner (also in Epstein contacts). Named in Epstein's contacts. Former Senior Adviser to President Trump.

leonardo-dicaprio-ep.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
leonardo-dicaprio-ep.bio: American actor. One of the most famous actors in the world. Named in Epstein's contacts.

george-clooney-ep.name: George Clooney
george-clooney-ep.bio: American actor, filmmaker, and activist. Named in Epstein's contacts.

phil-donahue.name: Phil Donahue
phil-donahue.bio: American media personality and talk show host. Named in Epstein's black book. Pioneer of the tabloid talk show format.

michael-fuchs.name: Michael Fuchs
michael-fuchs.bio: American media executive. Former chairman of HBO. Named in Epstein's black book.

alberto-pinto.name: Alberto Pinto
alberto-pinto.bio: French interior designer (1945-2012). One of the most celebrated interior designers in the world. Named in Epstein's black book. Designed interiors for royalty and billionaires.

alec-wildenstein.name: Alec Wildenstein
alec-wildenstein.bio: French-American billionaire art dealer (1940-2008). Part of the Wildenstein art dynasty. Named in Epstein's black book.

guy-wildenstein.name: Guy Wildenstein
guy-wildenstein.bio: French-American art dealer. Head of the Wildenstein art dynasty. Named in Epstein's black book. Later charged with tax fraud in France.

stephen-fry-ep.name: Stephen Fry
stephen-fry-ep.bio: British actor, writer, and television presenter. Named in Epstein's black book.

courtney-sale-ross.name: Courtney Sale Ross
courtney-sale-ross.bio: American philanthropist and filmmaker. Widow of Time Warner CEO Steve Ross. Named in Epstein's contacts. Hosted the elite Ross School in the Hamptons.

mercedes-bass.name: Mercedes Bass
mercedes-bass.bio: American socialite and philanthropist. Wife of Texas billionaire Sid Bass. Named in Epstein's contacts. Major arts patron.

chris-anderson-ted.name: Chris Anderson
chris-anderson-ted.bio: British-American entrepreneur. Head of TED (Technology Entertainment Design). Named in Epstein's contacts through the intellectual/ideas circuit.

anthony-von-mandl.name: Anthony von Mandl
anthony-von-mandl.bio: Canadian billionaire businessman. Owner of Mark Anthony Group (Mike's Hard Lemonade, White Claw). Named in Epstein's contacts.

vittorio-assaf.name: Vittorio Assaf
vittorio-assaf.bio: Italian restaurateur. Co-founder of Serafina restaurant chain. Named in Epstein's black book.

bruce-springsteen-ep.name: Bruce Springsteen
bruce-springsteen-ep.bio: American rock musician. "The Boss." Named in Epstein's contacts.

mariah-carey-ep.name: Mariah Carey
mariah-carey-ep.bio: American singer, songwriter, and actress. One of the best-selling music artists. Named in Epstein's contacts.

adnan-khashoggi.name: Adnan Khashoggi
adnan-khashoggi.bio: Saudi Arabian businessman and arms dealer (1935-2017). Once considered the richest man in the world. Uncle of Dodi Fayed. Named in Epstein's contacts. His yacht, the Nabila, was purchased by Donald Trump and renamed Trump Princess. Part of the shadowy international arms-dealing and intelligence circles that overlapped with the Epstein-Maxwell network.

mohammed-al-maktoum.name: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum
mohammed-al-maktoum.bio: Ruler of Dubai and Vice President of the UAE. Named in Epstein's black book. One of the wealthiest royals in the world. Later faced his own scandals involving Princess Haya's escape from Dubai.

petrina-khashoggi.name: Petrina Khashoggi
petrina-khashoggi.bio: British socialite. Daughter of Adnan Khashoggi. Named in Epstein's contacts. Part of the international socialite scene connected to Maxwell.

nicole-junkermann.name: Nicole Junkermann
nicole-junkermann.bio: British-German businesswoman and investor. Flew on the Lolita Express. Connected to Israeli intelligence through her investment in Reporty Homeland Security (later Carbyne) alongside Ehud Barak. Founded NJF Holdings. Appointed to NHS England advisory board. One of the most mysterious recurring figures in the Epstein network  -  connections span tech, intelligence, health data, and venture capital.

celina-midelfart.name: Celina Midelfart
celina-midelfart.bio: Norwegian businesswoman and heiress. Appeared on Epstein flight logs. Former girlfriend of Donald Trump. Connected to the Palm Beach and New York social scenes. Part of the Scandinavian aristocratic circle in Epstein's orbit.

shelley-lewis.name: Shelley Lewis
shelley-lewis.bio: American television producer. Appeared on Epstein flight logs alongside Bill Clinton on the Africa trip. Producer for ABC News and NBC News.

tony-figueroa.name: Tony Figueroa
tony-figueroa.bio: Epstein employee and frequent flight log passenger. Named in investigations as having played a role in recruiting young women for Epstein. One of the most frequently appearing names on the Lolita Express manifests.

mark-lloyd-ep.name: Mark Lloyd
mark-lloyd-ep.bio: Named on Epstein flight logs as a passenger on the Lolita Express. Limited public information available.

rinaldo-rizzo.name: Rinaldo Rizzo
rinaldo-rizzo.bio: Former butler at Epstein's Palm Beach mansion. Key prosecution witness. Testified to police about witnessing naked young girls at the property, topless girls by the pool, and Epstein's daily routine of receiving "massages." His testimony was critical to the Palm Beach police investigation. Wife also worked for Epstein as a cook.

igor-zinoviev.name: Igor Zinoviev
igor-zinoviev.bio: Russian-born former MMA fighter and bodyguard for Jeffrey Epstein. Named in investigations as part of Epstein's personal security detail. His background in martial arts and cage fighting made him an intimidating presence.

claire-hazel.name: Claire Hazel
claire-hazel.bio: Worked at Epstein's Paris apartment on Avenue Foch. Named in the French investigation into Epstein's activities in Paris. Paris prosecutors opened an investigation in 2019.

robert-giuffre.name: Sky Roberts (Robert Giuffre)
robert-giuffre.bio: Father of Virginia Giuffre, Epstein's most prominent accuser. Worked as a maintenance man at Mar-a-Lago, which is where Virginia was recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell at age 16. His employment at Trump's club was the setting for the recruitment.

lindsay-menza.name: Lindsay Menza
lindsay-menza.bio: Epstein victim who was recruited as a teenager. Filed civil claims against the estate. Part of the growing number of women who came forward after Epstein's 2019 arrest.

marijke-chartouni.name: Marijke Chartouni
marijke-chartouni.bio: Epstein victim and accuser. Filed suit against the estate. Alleged she was sexually abused by Epstein at his properties.

courtney-robinson.name: Courtney Robinson
courtney-robinson.bio: Epstein victim who testified about being abused as a teenager in Palm Beach. Part of the group of victims from the original Palm Beach police investigation.

dainya-nida.name: Dainya Nida
dainya-nida.bio: Jane Doe in Epstein civil litigation. Alleged systematic abuse at Epstein's Palm Beach property.

jane-doe-15.name: Jane Doe 15
jane-doe-15.bio: Unidentified victim who filed suit in 2019 alleging she was sexually abused by Epstein at his New Mexico ranch when she was 15 years old. One of many victims identified only by pseudonyms in court filings.

guy-lewis.name: Guy Lewis
guy-lewis.bio: American attorney. Former U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida. Part of Epstein's legal defense team. Connected to Epstein's legal strategy in the 2008 plea deal.

stan-pottinger.name: Stan Pottinger
stan-pottinger.bio: American attorney and author. Former Assistant Attorney General under Nixon and Ford. Was in a romantic relationship with victim Annie Farmer's mother. Later attempted to negotiate a deal with Epstein on behalf of victims, creating a conflict of interest. His complicated dual role was scrutinized by journalists.

ty-gee.name: Ty Gee
ty-gee.bio: Palm Beach County prosecutor. Was initially assigned the Epstein case but faced political pressure. The decision to refer the case to the state attorney rather than pursuing aggressive prosecution was part of the systemic failure that allowed Epstein to evade justice for years.

laura-menninger.name: Laura Menninger
laura-menninger.bio: American attorney. Lead defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell at her 2021 federal trial. Part of the Haddon, Morgan and Foreman firm. Mounted an aggressive defense that ultimately failed when Maxwell was convicted on 5 of 6 counts.

nadhim-zahawi.name: Nadhim Zahawi
nadhim-zahawi.bio: British-Iraqi politician. Former UK Chancellor of the Exchequer and Education Secretary. Admitted to attending a dinner at Epstein's Manhattan townhouse in 2013 (after Epstein's first conviction). Later sacked from government over tax affairs.

pierre-berge.name: Pierre Berge
pierre-berge.bio: French businessman (1930-2017). Co-founder of the Yves Saint Laurent fashion house. Named in Epstein's contacts through Paris social circles.

bob-geldof.name: Bob Geldof
bob-geldof.bio: Irish singer-songwriter and activist. Named in Epstein's contacts. Organized Live Aid.

tony-ryan.name: Tony Ryan
tony-ryan.bio: Irish businessman (1936-2007). Founder of Ryanair. Named in Epstein's contacts.

johan-eliasch.name: Johan Eliasch
johan-eliasch.bio: Swedish billionaire businessman. CEO of Head NV (ski/tennis equipment). Named in Epstein's contacts through London social and business circles.

nicky-haslam.name: Nicky Haslam
nicky-haslam.bio: British interior designer and socialite. Named in Epstein's contacts. Part of the London social set connected through Maxwell.

aga-khan.name: Aga Khan IV
aga-khan.bio: Spiritual leader of Ismaili Muslims and billionaire. Named in Epstein's contacts. One of the wealthiest royals in the world.

vittorio-emanuele.name: Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy
vittorio-emanuele.bio: Italian prince (1937-2024). Head of the House of Savoy, former Italian royal family. Named in Epstein's contacts. Later arrested for corruption and sex trafficking charges in Italy (separate case). His son married a daughter of Max Planck Institute director.

edgar-de-picciotto.name: Edgar de Picciotto
edgar-de-picciotto.bio: Swiss banker (1929-2021). Founder of Union Bancaire Privee (UBP), one of Switzerland's largest private banks. Named in Epstein's black book. Part of the international private banking world that facilitated wealth management.

peter-dubens.name: Peter Dubens
peter-dubens.bio: British entrepreneur and investor. Founder of Oakley Capital. Named in Epstein's contacts through London financial circles.

james-v-kimsey.name: James V. Kimsey
james-v-kimsey.bio: American businessman (1939-2016). Co-founder of AOL. Named in Epstein's contacts through the DC/Virginia social scene.

john-henry-ep.name: John Henry
john-henry-ep.bio: American billionaire businessman. Owner of the Boston Red Sox, Liverpool FC, and The Boston Globe. Named in Epstein's contacts.

george-whitesides.name: George Whitesides
george-whitesides.bio: American chemist. Harvard professor and one of the most cited chemists in history. Received Epstein-linked funding for his research. Part of the Harvard scientific elite that Epstein cultivated.

david-gelernter.name: David Gelernter
david-gelernter.bio: American computer scientist. Yale professor. Former Unabomber victim. Named in Epstein's intellectual circle. Attended Epstein-sponsored science events.

freeman-dyson.name: Freeman Dyson
freeman-dyson.bio: British-American theoretical physicist (1923-2020). Princeton Institute for Advanced Study. Attended Epstein's science gatherings and dinners. One of the most brilliant physicists of his era.

jim-watson.name: James Watson
jim-watson.bio: American molecular biologist. Nobel laureate. Co-discoverer of DNA structure. Attended Epstein's science conferences and gatherings.

jack-goldsmith-law.name: Jack Goldsmith
jack-goldsmith-law.bio: American legal scholar. Harvard Law professor. Former Assistant Attorney General under George W. Bush. Wrote about the Epstein case and the legal system's failures. His analysis of how Epstein manipulated the legal process was influential.

vicky-ward.name: Vicky Ward
vicky-ward.bio: British-American investigative journalist. Wrote the first major profile of Epstein for Vanity Fair in 2003, but alleged that editor Graydon Carter removed the most damaging allegations from the article. This editorial decision potentially delayed justice by years. Later wrote extensively about the Epstein case.

dominick-dunne.name: Dominick Dunne
dominick-dunne.bio: American journalist and novelist (1925-2009). Vanity Fair investigative journalist who covered high-profile crimes among the wealthy. Was interested in the Epstein story before his death.

chris-hansen.name: Chris Hansen
chris-hansen.bio: American journalist. Known for "To Catch a Predator." Investigated the Epstein case for his Investigation Discovery series. Interviewed victims and examined law enforcement failures.

conchita-sarnoff.name: Conchita Sarnoff
conchita-sarnoff.bio: Journalist and author of "TrafficKing: The Jeffrey Epstein Case." One of the first journalists to extensively investigate Epstein's crimes and the failures of the justice system.

chris-evans-ep.name: Chris Evans (UK)
chris-evans-ep.bio: British television and radio presenter. Named in Epstein's contacts.

rupert-everett.name: Rupert Everett
rupert-everett.bio: British actor. Named in Epstein's contacts through London social circles.

griffin-dunne.name: Griffin Dunne
griffin-dunne.bio: American actor, director, and producer. Son of Dominick Dunne. Named in Epstein's contacts.

lorne-michaels.name: Lorne Michaels
lorne-michaels.bio: Canadian-American television producer. Creator of Saturday Night Live. Named in Epstein's contacts.

ziel-feldman.name: Ziel Feldman
ziel-feldman.bio: American real estate developer. Founder of HFZ Capital Group. Named in Epstein's contacts through New York real estate circles.

ben-novack-jr.name: Ben Novack Jr.
ben-novack-jr.bio: American heir and memorabilia collector (1956-2009). Son of the Fontainebleau Hotel founder. Named in Epstein's contacts through Palm Beach and Miami social scenes. Later murdered by his wife.

glenn-straub.name: Glenn Straub
glenn-straub.bio: American real estate investor. Purchased the Revel Casino in Atlantic City. Named in Epstein's contacts.

scott-rothstein.name: Scott Rothstein
scott-rothstein.bio: American disbarred attorney and convicted fraudster. Ran a $1.2 billion Ponzi scheme from Fort Lauderdale. Had overlapping connections with the Epstein network in the Palm Beach/South Florida legal and social scene.

jeff-bezos-ep.name: Jeff Bezos
jeff-bezos-ep.bio: American billionaire. Founder of Amazon and Blue Origin. Owner of The Washington Post. Named in Epstein's contacts. The Post's reporting on Epstein was scrutinized for potential conflicts.

laurene-powell-jobs.name: Laurene Powell Jobs
laurene-powell-jobs.bio: American billionaire businesswoman and philanthropist. Widow of Steve Jobs. Named in Epstein's contacts through Silicon Valley and philanthropic circles.

pierre-omidyar.name: Pierre Omidyar
pierre-omidyar.bio: French-born American billionaire. Founder of eBay. Named in Epstein's contacts through tech philanthropy circles.

harry-macmillan.name: Alexander Macmillan (Viscount Macmillan)
harry-macmillan.bio: British peer and grandson of Prime Minister Harold Macmillan. Named in Epstein's contacts through the British aristocratic social scene.

carol-bamford.name: Lady Bamford
carol-bamford.bio: British socialite and businesswoman. Wife of Lord Bamford (JCB founder). Named in Epstein's contacts through London social circles.

stephanie-winston-wolkoff.name: Stephanie Winston Wolkoff
stephanie-winston-wolkoff.bio: American event planner and author. Former adviser to Melania Trump. Connected to the New York social scene that overlapped with Epstein's world. Later wrote a tell-all about the Trumps.

ruslana-korshunova.name: Ruslana Korshunova
ruslana-korshunova.bio: Kazakh supermodel (1987-2008). Found dead after falling from her NYC apartment. Her death was investigated in connection with possible links to the modeling industry predator network involving Brunel and Epstein, though no formal connection was established.

robert-mueller-spec.name: Robert Mueller
robert-mueller-spec.bio: Former FBI Director (2001-2013). The FBI under his leadership was criticized for its handling of the Epstein case, particularly questions about whether the Bureau adequately investigated Epstein's possible intelligence connections and the full scope of his trafficking network during the 2006-2008 investigation.

loretta-lynch.name: Loretta Lynch
loretta-lynch.bio: Former U.S. Attorney General (2015-2017). The DOJ under her watch did not reopen the Epstein case despite growing evidence and victim advocacy. Questions about why federal prosecutors did not act earlier remained unanswered.

cy-vance.name: Cyrus Vance Jr.
cy-vance.bio: American attorney. Former Manhattan District Attorney. His office argued to reduce Epstein's sex offender status from Level 3 (highest risk) to Level 1 (lowest) in 2011, drawing intense criticism. His office received a $25,000 donation from Epstein lawyer David Boies's law firm.

amy-friedkin.name: Amy Friedkin
amy-friedkin.bio: Former president of AIPAC. San Francisco-based Democratic activist and philanthropist.

bernice-manocherian.name: Bernice Manocherian
bernice-manocherian.bio: Former AIPAC president. New York real estate executive and major Democratic donor.

lonny-kaplan.name: Lonny Kaplan
lonny-kaplan.bio: Former AIPAC president. Detroit-area business executive and major pro-Israel fundraiser.

lee-rosenberg.name: Lee Rosenberg
lee-rosenberg.bio: Former AIPAC president. Chicago-based media executive and close associate of President Obama.

howard-friedman.name: Howard Friedman
howard-friedman.bio: Former AIPAC president. Tulsa-based businessman and prominent pro-Israel activist.

david-victor.name: David Victor
david-victor.bio: Former AIPAC president. Midwest-based executive and longtime AIPAC board member.

bob-cohen-aipac.name: Bob Cohen
bob-cohen-aipac.bio: Former AIPAC president. Active in AIPAC leadership for decades before serving as president.

douglas-bloomfield.name: Douglas Bloomfield
douglas-bloomfield.bio: Former AIPAC legislative director and longtime Washington lobbyist. Columnist for the Jerusalem Post.

brad-gordon.name: Brad Gordon
brad-gordon.bio: Former AIPAC director of policy and government affairs. Key lobbyist on Iran sanctions legislation.

rahm-emanuel.name: Rahm Emanuel
rahm-emanuel.bio: US Ambassador to Japan since 2022. Previously White House Chief of Staff under Obama (2009-2010), Mayor of Chicago (2011-2019), and US Representative from Illinois. Known for aggressive political style.

affiliations.role: US Ambassador to Japan / Former Chicago Mayor

dianne-feinstein.name: Dianne Feinstein
dianne-feinstein.bio: Longest-serving female senator in US history. Served California 1992-2023. Chaired Senate Intelligence Committee. First female mayor of San Francisco. Died September 2023.

adam-schiff.name: Adam Schiff
adam-schiff.bio: US Senator from California since 2024. Previously US Representative (2001-2024). Chaired House Intelligence Committee. Led first impeachment of President Trump.

jerry-nadler.name: Jerry Nadler
jerry-nadler.bio: US Representative from New York since 1992. Chaired House Judiciary Committee. One of the longest-serving members of Congress.

stephen-miller.name: Stephen Miller
stephen-miller.bio: Senior policy advisor to President Trump. Architect of immigration policy. Currently Deputy Chief of Staff for Policy in Trump's second term.

affiliations.role: White House Deputy Chief of Staff for Policy

gary-gensler.name: Gary Gensler
gary-gensler.bio: Chairman of SEC (2021-2025). Previously Chair of CFTC under Obama. Former Goldman Sachs partner. MIT professor.

alejandro-mayorkas.name: Alejandro Mayorkas
alejandro-mayorkas.bio: First Latino and first immigrant to serve as DHS Secretary (2021-2025). Born in Havana to Cuban Jewish family that fled the Holocaust. Previously Deputy Secretary of DHS.

ron-klain.name: Ron Klain
ron-klain.bio: White House Chief of Staff under Biden (2021-2023). Previously Chief of Staff to Vice Presidents Gore and Biden. Led Obama's Ebola response.

affiliations.role: Former White House Chief of Staff

jeff-zients.name: Jeff Zients
jeff-zients.bio: White House Chief of Staff under Biden (2023-2025). Previously COVID-19 Response Coordinator. Former director of the National Economic Council.

affiliations.role: Former White House Chief of Staff

stephen-breyer.name: Stephen Breyer
stephen-breyer.bio: Associate Justice of the Supreme Court (1994-2022), appointed by Clinton. Known for pragmatic approach to constitutional interpretation.

joseph-lieberman.name: Joseph Lieberman
joseph-lieberman.bio: US Senator from Connecticut (1989-2013). First Jewish candidate on a major party presidential ticket (2000, as Al Gore's VP pick). Independent Democrat. Died March 2024.

al-franken.name: Al Franken
al-franken.bio: US Senator from Minnesota (2009-2018). Previously a comedian and writer on Saturday Night Live. Resigned amid misconduct allegations.

carl-levin.name: Carl Levin
carl-levin.bio: Longest-serving US Senator in Michigan history (1979-2015). Chaired Senate Armed Services Committee. Known for oversight of Pentagon and Wall Street.

arlen-specter.name: Arlen Specter
arlen-specter.bio: US Senator from Pennsylvania (1981-2011). Switched from Republican to Democrat in 2009. Former Philadelphia DA and Warren Commission staffer.

richard-blumenthal.name: Richard Blumenthal
richard-blumenthal.bio: US Senator from Connecticut since 2011. Previously Connecticut Attorney General for 20 years. Known for consumer protection advocacy.

brian-schatz.name: Brian Schatz
brian-schatz.bio: US Senator from Hawaii since 2012. Progressive Democrat focused on climate change and education policy.

nita-lowey.name: Nita Lowey
nita-lowey.bio: US Representative from New York (1989-2021). First woman to chair House Appropriations Committee. Major advocate for US foreign aid to Israel.

jamie-raskin.name: Jamie Raskin
jamie-raskin.bio: US Representative from Maryland since 2017. Led second impeachment of President Trump. Constitutional law professor at American University.

debbie-wasserman-schultz.name: Debbie Wasserman Schultz
debbie-wasserman-schultz.bio: US Representative from Florida since 2005. Former chair of the Democratic National Committee (2011-2016).

lee-zeldin.name: Lee Zeldin
lee-zeldin.bio: EPA Administrator in Trump's second term. Previously US Representative from New York (2015-2023). First Jewish Republican elected to Congress from New York in over a century.

josh-shapiro.name: Josh Shapiro
josh-shapiro.bio: Governor of Pennsylvania since January 2023. Previously served as Pennsylvania Attorney General (2017-2023). Won the 2022 gubernatorial race by 15 points. Considered a rising star in the Democratic Party.

jared-polis.name: Jared Polis
jared-polis.bio: Governor of Colorado since 2019, re-elected in 2022. First openly gay man elected governor of any US state. Previously US Representative. Tech entrepreneur and founder of several companies.

jb-pritzker.name: J.B. Pritzker
jb-pritzker.bio: Governor of Illinois since 2019, re-elected in 2022. Billionaire businessman and member of the Pritzker family (Hyatt Hotels). Major Democratic donor before entering politics.

moses-alexander.name: Moses Alexander
moses-alexander.bio: First Jewish governor in US history. Born in Bavaria, Germany. Served as mayor of Boise before becoming governor. Democrat who enacted progressive reforms.

abraham-ribicoff.name: Abraham Ribicoff
abraham-ribicoff.bio: Governor of Connecticut 1955-1961. Later served as US Senator (1963-1981) and HEW Secretary under JFK. Famously criticized Chicago police at the 1968 Democratic Convention.

herbert-lehman.name: Herbert Lehman
herbert-lehman.bio: Governor of New York during the Great Depression and early WWII. Later US Senator (1949-1957). Member of the Lehman Brothers banking family. Major supporter of civil liberties.

ed-rendell.name: Ed Rendell
ed-rendell.bio: Governor of Pennsylvania 2003-2011. Previously mayor of Philadelphia (1992-2000) and DA of Philadelphia. Chaired the Democratic National Committee (2000-2001).

marvin-mandel.name: Marvin Mandel
marvin-mandel.bio: Governor of Maryland 1969-1979. Served as Speaker of the Maryland House of Delegates before becoming governor. Later convicted of mail fraud.

milton-shapp.name: Milton Shapp
milton-shapp.bio: Governor of Pennsylvania 1971-1979. First Jewish governor of Pennsylvania. Cable television pioneer. Ran for president in 1976.

madeleine-kunin.name: Madeleine Kunin
madeleine-kunin.bio: First female governor of Vermont and first Jewish woman to serve as a state governor. Later served as US Ambassador to Switzerland under Clinton. Born in Zurich to a Jewish family that fled Nazi persecution.

frank-licht.name: Frank Licht
frank-licht.bio: Governor of Rhode Island 1969-1973. First Jewish governor of Rhode Island. Previously a state senator. Appointed the first African American to the Rhode Island judiciary.

linda-lingle.name: Linda Lingle
linda-lingle.bio: First female and first Jewish governor of Hawaii. First Republican governor of the state in 40 years. Previously mayor of Maui. Converted to Judaism.

neil-goldschmidt.name: Neil Goldschmidt
neil-goldschmidt.bio: Governor of Oregon 1987-1991. Previously US Secretary of Transportation under Carter and mayor of Portland.

julius-meier.name: Julius Meier
julius-meier.bio: Governor of Oregon as an Independent. President of Meier & Frank department store chain. Supported public power development and highway construction.

arthur-seligman.name: Arthur Seligman
arthur-seligman.bio: Governor of New Mexico 1931-1933. Member of the prominent Seligman banking and mercantile family of the Southwest. Died in office.

ernest-gruening.name: Ernest Gruening
ernest-gruening.bio: Governor of the Territory of Alaska (1939-1953) and one of Alaska's first US Senators (1959-1969). One of only two senators to vote against the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution.

bernard-marcus.name: Bernard Marcus
bernard-marcus.bio: American billionaire businessman. Co-founder of The Home Depot. Born 1929 in Newark, NJ, to Russian Jewish immigrant parents. Major Republican donor and Israel supporter.

irving-moskowitz.name: Irving Moskowitz
irving-moskowitz.bio: American billionaire physician and philanthropist. Born 1928. Major funder of Jewish settlements in East Jerusalem. Significant AIPAC donor. Died 2016.

adam-milstein.name: Adam Milstein
adam-milstein.bio: Israeli-American real estate investor and philanthropist. Born 1952 in Haifa, Israel. National Board Member of AIPAC. Co-founder of Israeli-American Council. Active in combating BDS movement.

stacy-burdett.name: Stacy Burdett
stacy-burdett.bio: American lobbyist. Former Vice President of Government Affairs at AIPAC. Key figure in AIPAC congressional outreach strategy.

jonathan-zucker.name: Jonathan Zucker
jonathan-zucker.bio: American businessman and Israel advocate. Active AIPAC supporter and donor. Involved in pro-Israel political activism.

tom-delay.name: Tom DeLay
tom-delay.bio: American politician. Former Republican House Majority Leader (2003-2006). One of the strongest Congressional allies of Israel and AIPAC during his tenure.

eliot-engel.name: Eliot Engel
eliot-engel.bio: American politician. Former US Representative from New York (1989-2021). Former Chairman of House Foreign Affairs Committee. Strong AIPAC ally and Israel supporter.

brad-schneider.name: Brad Schneider
brad-schneider.bio: American politician. US Representative from Illinois since 2017. Jewish. Co-chair of the House Bipartisan Task Force for Combating Antisemitism. Strong AIPAC ally.

lee-zeldin-aipac.name: Lee Zeldin
lee-zeldin-aipac.bio: American politician. EPA Administrator under Trump (2025). Former US Representative from New York (2015-2023). Jewish. Strong pro-Israel voice and AIPAC ally.

hakeem-jeffries.name: Hakeem Jeffries
hakeem-jeffries.bio: American politician. House Minority Leader (2023-present). US Representative from New York. Has spoken at AIPAC Policy Conference.

john-fetterman.name: John Fetterman
john-fetterman.bio: American politician. US Senator from Pennsylvania since 2023. One of the most vocal pro-Israel voices in the Democratic caucus. Frequent AIPAC Policy Conference attendee.

mike-johnson.name: Mike Johnson
mike-johnson.bio: American politician. Speaker of the House (2023-present). Strong supporter of Israel. Has worked closely with AIPAC on Israel-related legislation.

ben-cardin.name: Ben Cardin
ben-cardin.bio: American politician. Former US Senator from Maryland (2007-2025). Jewish. Former Chairman of Senate Foreign Relations Committee. One of AIPAC's closest Senate allies.

john-boehner.name: John Boehner
john-boehner.bio: American politician. Former Speaker of the House (2011-2015). In 2015, invited Netanyahu to address Congress in coordination with AIPAC, bypassing the Obama White House.

jacob-lew.name: Jack Lew
jacob-lew.bio: American diplomat and lawyer. US Ambassador to Israel (2023-2025). Secretary of the Treasury under Obama (2013-2017). White House Chief of Staff (2012-2013). Born 1955 to an Orthodox Jewish family in New York.

affiliations.role: US Ambassador to Israel / Former Secretary of Treasury

david-axelrod.name: David Axelrod
david-axelrod.bio: American political consultant. Senior Advisor to President Obama (2009-2011). Chief strategist for Obama's 2008 and 2012 campaigns. Born 1955 in New York to a Jewish family.

ari-fleischer.name: Ari Fleischer
ari-fleischer.bio: American political consultant. White House Press Secretary under George W. Bush (2001-2003). Born 1960 to a Jewish family in New York. Fox News contributor.

josh-bolten.name: Josh Bolten
josh-bolten.bio: American political advisor. White House Chief of Staff under George W. Bush (2006-2009). Born 1954. Jewish. Former CEO of Business Roundtable.

affiliations.role: Former White House Chief of Staff

dan-shapiro.name: Dan Shapiro
dan-shapiro.bio: American diplomat. US Ambassador to Israel under Obama (2011-2017). Born 1969, Jewish. Senior Advisor for Middle East at National Security Council.

tom-friedman-nyt.name: Thomas Friedman
tom-friedman-nyt.bio: American journalist and author. Foreign affairs columnist for The New York Times. Born 1953 in Minneapolis to a Jewish family. Three-time Pulitzer Prize winner. Influential voice on Middle East policy.

eric-cantor.name: Eric Cantor
eric-cantor.bio: American politician. Former US Representative from Virginia (2001-2014). House Majority Leader (2011-2014). Only Jewish Republican in Congress during his tenure. Vice Chairman of Moelis & Company.

abe-foxman.name: Abraham Foxman
abe-foxman.bio: American attorney and activist. National Director of the Anti-Defamation League (1987-2015). Born 1940 in Baranovichi, Poland. Holocaust survivor. Major figure in American Jewish political life.

mort-klein.name: Morton Klein
mort-klein.bio: American Jewish leader. President of the Zionist Organization of America since 1993. Born 1948 in a displaced persons camp in Germany to Holocaust survivors. Influential voice in right-wing pro-Israel politics.

douglas-emhoff.name: Douglas Emhoff
douglas-emhoff.bio: American lawyer. Second Gentleman of the United States (2021-2025). Husband of Vice President Kamala Harris. Born 1964 to a Jewish family in Brooklyn, New York. First Jewish spouse of a US Vice President.

madeleine-albright.name: Madeleine Albright
madeleine-albright.bio: American diplomat. First female US Secretary of State (1997-2001). Born 1937 in Prague as Marie Jana Korbelová. Discovered her Jewish heritage in 1997. Died 2022.

affiliations.role: Former Secretary of State (Jewish heritage, deceased)

john-kerry-advisor-wendy-sherman.name: Wendy Sherman
john-kerry-advisor-wendy-sherman.bio: American diplomat. Deputy Secretary of State (2021-2023). Lead negotiator of the Iran Nuclear Deal (JCPOA). Born 1949. Jewish heritage.

victoria-nuland.name: Victoria Nuland
victoria-nuland.bio: American diplomat. Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs (2021-2024). Known for role in Ukraine policy. Born 1961. Jewish heritage. Married to Robert Kagan (neoconservative columnist).

sam-bankman-fried.name: Sam Bankman-Fried
sam-bankman-fried.bio: American former businessman. Founder of FTX cryptocurrency exchange. Born 1992 to a Jewish family. One of the largest political donors in 2022 midterm cycle before FTX collapse and fraud conviction.

alex-soros.name: Alex Soros
alex-soros.bio: American philanthropist. Son of George Soros. Chairman of Open Society Foundations since 2023. Born 1985. Active Democratic political donor.

elliot-abrams.name: Elliott Abrams
elliot-abrams.bio: American diplomat. Special Representative for Venezuela and Iran under Trump. Assistant Secretary of State under Reagan. Born 1948 to a Jewish family. Key neoconservative foreign policy figure.

paul-wolfowitz.name: Paul Wolfowitz
paul-wolfowitz.bio: American political scientist and diplomat. Deputy Secretary of Defense under George W. Bush (2001-2005). Key architect of the Iraq War. Born 1943 to a Jewish family. Former World Bank President.

douglas-feith.name: Douglas Feith
douglas-feith.bio: American attorney and government official. Under Secretary of Defense for Policy under Bush (2001-2005). Born 1953 to a Jewish family. Key figure in Iraq War planning.

affiliations.role: Former Under Secretary of Defense for Policy

richard-perle.name: Richard Perle
richard-perle.bio: American political advisor. Chairman of the Defense Policy Board (2001-2003). Known as the "Prince of Darkness" for his hawkish foreign policy views. Born 1941 to a Jewish family.

bill-kristol.name: William Kristol
bill-kristol.bio: American political analyst. Founder of The Weekly Standard. Co-founder of Project for the New American Century (PNAC). Born 1952 to a Jewish family. Son of Irving Kristol.

robert-kagan.name: Robert Kagan
robert-kagan.bio: American historian and foreign policy commentator. Co-founder of Project for the New American Century. Born 1958 to a Jewish family. Married to Victoria Nuland.

michael-chertoff.name: Michael Chertoff
michael-chertoff.bio: American attorney and government official. Secretary of Homeland Security under Bush (2005-2009). Born 1953 to a Jewish family (father was a rabbi). Former federal judge.

michael-mukasey.name: Michael Mukasey
michael-mukasey.bio: American jurist. US Attorney General under Bush (2007-2009). Born 1941 to a Jewish family in the Bronx. Former Chief Judge of the Southern District of New York.

jack-reed-ally.name: Jacky Rosen
jack-reed-ally.bio: American politician. US Senator from Nevada since 2019. Born 1957 to a Jewish family in Chicago. Former synagogue president. Serves on Senate Armed Services Committee.

jacky-rosen.name: Jacky Rosen
jacky-rosen.bio: American politician. US Senator from Nevada since 2019. Born 1957 to a Jewish family. Former synagogue president.

john-ossoff.name: Jon Ossoff
john-ossoff.bio: American politician. US Senator from Georgia since 2021. Born 1987 to a Jewish family in Atlanta. Youngest sitting US Senator at time of election.

elissa-slotkin.name: Elissa Slotkin
elissa-slotkin.bio: American politician. US Senator from Michigan since 2025. Former US Representative (2019-2025). Born 1976 to a Jewish family. Former CIA analyst.

dan-goldman.name: Dan Goldman
dan-goldman.bio: American politician and attorney. US Representative from New York since 2023. Born 1976 to a Jewish family. Former lead counsel in first Trump impeachment. Heir to Levi Strauss fortune.

jared-moskowitz.name: Jared Moskowitz
jared-moskowitz.bio: American politician. US Representative from Florida since 2023. Born 1980 to a Jewish family. Former Florida Division of Emergency Management director.

kathy-manning.name: Kathy Manning
kathy-manning.bio: American politician. US Representative from North Carolina (2021-2023). Born 1956 to a Jewish family. Former chair of Jewish Federations of North America.

lois-frankel.name: Lois Frankel
lois-frankel.bio: American politician. US Representative from Florida since 2013. Born 1948 to a Jewish family in New York.

sam-levinson-gov.name: Samuel H. Elrod
sam-levinson-gov.bio: American politician in post-Civil War South Carolina.

affiliations.role: Historical - Lt. Governor of South Carolina (1870s, one of earliest)

edward-salomon.name: Edward Salomon
edward-salomon.bio: German-American politician. Acting Governor of Wisconsin (1862). Born 1828 to a Jewish family in Prussia. Served during the Civil War.

michael-hahn-la.name: Michael Hahn
michael-hahn-la.bio: German-American politician. Governor of Louisiana during Reconstruction (1864-1865). Born 1830 in Bavaria to a Jewish family. First Jewish governor of a US state.

david-emanuel.name: David Emanuel
david-emanuel.bio: American politician. Governor of Georgia in 1801. Born 1744 to a Jewish family. Emanuel County, Georgia is named after him. One of earliest Jewish governors in US history.

washington-bartlett.name: Washington Bartlett
washington-bartlett.bio: American politician. Governor of California (1887). Born 1824 to a Jewish family. Died in office after only 9 months.

simon-bamberger.name: Simon Bamberger
simon-bamberger.bio: German-American businessman and politician. Governor of Utah (1917-1921). Born 1846 in Eberstadt, Germany, to a Jewish family. First non-Mormon governor of Utah.

samuel-levy.name: Samuel Levy
samuel-levy.bio: American politician. Borough President of Manhattan (1930-1937). Jewish community leader in New York.

eliot-spitzer.name: Eliot Spitzer
eliot-spitzer.bio: American politician and attorney. Governor of New York (2007-2008). Born 1959 to a Jewish family. Former NY Attorney General. Resigned due to scandal.

eric-greitens.name: Eric Greitens
eric-greitens.bio: American politician. Governor of Missouri (2017-2018). Born 1974. Jewish (converted). Navy SEAL veteran. Resigned due to scandal.

larry-summers.name: Larry Summers
larry-summers.bio: American economist. Former Treasury Secretary, former Harvard President. Visited Epstein after conviction. Born 1954 to a Jewish family.

leslie-wexner-ep.name: Leslie Wexner
leslie-wexner-ep.bio: American billionaire. Founder of L Brands (Victoria's Secret). Only known major client of Epstein. Gave Epstein power of attorney and $46M Manhattan mansion. Born 1937 to Jewish immigrants from Russia.

george-mitchell-ep.name: George Mitchell
george-mitchell-ep.bio: American politician. Former Senate Majority Leader (1989-1995). Named in Epstein-related testimonies. Denied wrongdoing.

ehud-barak-ep.name: Ehud Barak
ehud-barak-ep.bio: Israeli politician and military leader. Former Prime Minister of Israel (1999-2001). Business relationship with Epstein. Photographed at Epstein's residence. Invested in Epstein-linked company Carbyne.

adam-sandler.name: Adam Sandler
adam-sandler.bio: American actor, comedian and filmmaker. Born 1966 in Brooklyn to a Jewish family. Known for "The Chanukah Song" and numerous comedy films.

ben-stiller.name: Ben Stiller
ben-stiller.bio: American actor and filmmaker. Born 1965 in New York to a Jewish family (parents Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara). Known for Zoolander, Meet the Parents, etc.

woody-allen-ent.name: Woody Allen
woody-allen-ent.bio: American filmmaker. Born Allan Stewart Konigsberg in 1935 in Brooklyn to a Jewish family. Academy Award-winning director of Annie Hall, Manhattan, etc.

larry-david.name: Larry David
larry-david.bio: American comedian. Born 1947 in Brooklyn to a Jewish family. Co-creator of Seinfeld. Creator and star of Curb Your Enthusiasm.

sarah-silverman.name: Sarah Silverman
sarah-silverman.bio: American comedian and actress. Born 1970 in Bedford, NH, to a Jewish family. Known for provocative comedy addressing social issues.

sacha-baron-cohen.name: Sacha Baron Cohen
sacha-baron-cohen.bio: British-American actor and comedian. Born 1971 in London to a Jewish family. Known for Borat, Ali G. Active in combating antisemitism and online hate.

harrison-ford.name: Harrison Ford
harrison-ford.bio: American actor. Born 1942 in Chicago. Mother was Russian Jewish. Known for Star Wars, Indiana Jones franchises. One of the highest-grossing actors of all time.

jake-gyllenhaal.name: Jake Gyllenhaal
jake-gyllenhaal.bio: American actor. Born 1980. Mother is of Ashkenazi Jewish descent. Known for Brokeback Mountain, Nightcrawler, etc.

joaquin-phoenix.name: Joaquin Phoenix
joaquin-phoenix.bio: American actor. Born 1974. Of Ashkenazi Jewish descent from father's side. Academy Award winner for Joker.

jeff-goldblum.name: Jeff Goldblum
jeff-goldblum.bio: American actor. Born 1952 in Pittsburgh to a Jewish family. Known for Jurassic Park, The Fly, Independence Day.

andy-samberg.name: Andy Samberg
andy-samberg.bio: American actor and comedian. Born 1978 in Berkeley, CA, to a Jewish family. Known for Brooklyn Nine-Nine, SNL, The Lonely Island.

jonah-hill.name: Jonah Hill
jonah-hill.bio: American actor and filmmaker. Born Jonah Hill Feldstein in 1983 in LA to a Jewish family. Two-time Oscar nominee.

seth-meyers.name: Seth Meyers
seth-meyers.bio: American comedian. Born 1973. Of Jewish and German-Swedish descent. Host of Late Night with Seth Meyers. Former SNL anchor.

mark-zuckerberg-media.name: Mark Zuckerberg
mark-zuckerberg-media.bio: American businessman. Co-founder and CEO of Meta Platforms (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp). Born 1984 to a Jewish family in White Plains, NY.

sergey-brin-media.name: Sergey Brin
sergey-brin-media.bio: American businessman. Co-founder of Google/Alphabet. Born 1973 in Moscow to a Jewish family. Emigrated to US in 1979.

larry-page-assoc.name: Larry Page
larry-page-assoc.bio: American businessman. Co-founder of Google/Alphabet. Born 1973. Business partner of Sergey Brin.

susan-wojcicki.name: Susan Wojcicki
susan-wojcicki.bio: American businesswoman. Former CEO of YouTube (2014-2023). Born 1968 to a Jewish mother. Died 2024. Key figure in Google's early days (Google's first office was in her garage).

ari-emanuel-media.name: Ari Emanuel
ari-emanuel-media.bio: American talent agent. CEO of Endeavor (parent of WME, UFC). Born 1961 to a Jewish family. Brother of Rahm Emanuel. One of the most powerful figures in entertainment.

haim-saban-media.name: Haim Saban
haim-saban-media.bio: Israeli-American media mogul. Creator of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers. Former chairman of Univision. Born 1944 in Alexandria, Egypt, to a Jewish family. Major Democratic donor.

mort-zuckerman-media.name: Mortimer Zuckerman
mort-zuckerman-media.bio: Canadian-American businessman. Former owner of New York Daily News and U.S. News & World Report. Born 1937 to a Jewish family in Montreal.

affiliations.role: Former Owner of NY Daily News / US News

arthur-sulzberger.name: A.G. Sulzberger
arthur-sulzberger.bio: American journalist. Publisher of The New York Times since 2018. Born 1980. Part of the Sulzberger family which has controlled the NYT since 1896. Family has Jewish heritage (patriarch Adolph Ochs).

affiliations.role: Publisher of The New York Times

donald-graham.name: Donald Graham
donald-graham.bio: American businessman. Former publisher of The Washington Post (1979-2000) and chairman of The Washington Post Company. Half-Jewish heritage through mother Katharine Graham.

george-soros-phil.name: George Soros
george-soros-phil.bio: Hungarian-American billionaire. Founder of Open Society Foundations. Born 1930 in Budapest to a Jewish family. One of the world's largest philanthropists. Holocaust survivor.

michael-bloomberg-phil.name: Michael Bloomberg
michael-bloomberg-phil.bio: American billionaire. Founder of Bloomberg LP and Bloomberg Philanthropies. Former NYC Mayor. Born 1942 to a Jewish family.

sheldon-adelson-phil.name: Sheldon Adelson
sheldon-adelson-phil.bio: American billionaire. Founded Adelson Family Foundation. Massive donor to Birthright Israel, Yad Vashem, and Republican causes. Died 2021.

michael-steinhardt-phil.name: Michael Steinhardt
michael-steinhardt-phil.bio: American financier and philanthropist. Co-founder of Birthright Israel. Major donor to Jewish causes. Born 1940 to a Jewish family in Brooklyn.

edgar-bronfman-sr-phil.name: Edgar Bronfman Sr.
edgar-bronfman-sr-phil.bio: Canadian-American businessman. Former president of the World Jewish Congress (1981-2007). CEO of Seagram. Born 1929 to a Jewish family. Died 2013.

les-wexner-phil.name: Leslie Wexner
les-wexner-phil.bio: American billionaire. Founder of L Brands. Founded the Wexner Foundation. Major donor to Ohio State University. Born 1937 to Jewish immigrants.

seth-klarman-phil.name: Seth Klarman
seth-klarman-phil.bio: American billionaire. CEO of Baupost Group. Klarman Family Foundation supports democracy, science, and Jewish causes. Born 1957 to a Jewish family.

mark-zuckerberg-phil.name: Mark Zuckerberg
mark-zuckerberg-phil.bio: American billionaire. Co-founder of Facebook/Meta. Chan Zuckerberg Initiative has pledged billions. Born 1984 to a Jewish family.

sergey-brin-phil.name: Sergey Brin
sergey-brin-phil.bio: American billionaire. Co-founder of Google. Active philanthropist. Born 1973 in Moscow to a Jewish family.

larry-ellison-phil.name: Larry Ellison
larry-ellison-phil.bio: American billionaire. Co-founder of Oracle. Ellison Medical Foundation focused on aging research. Born 1944, adopted by Jewish immigrants.

priscilla-chan-zuck.name: Priscilla Chan
priscilla-chan-zuck.bio: American philanthropist and physician. Co-founder of Chan Zuckerberg Initiative with husband Mark Zuckerberg.

bernard-marcus-phil.name: Bernard Marcus
bernard-marcus-phil.bio: American billionaire. Co-founder of Home Depot. The Marcus Foundation. Major supporter of Israel, veterans, and Georgia Aquarium. Born 1929 to a Jewish family.

paul-singer-phil.name: Paul Singer
paul-singer-phil.bio: American billionaire. Founder of Elliott Management. Significant philanthropist supporting Jewish causes, LGBTQ rights, and Republican politics.

john-von-neumann.name: John von Neumann
john-von-neumann.bio: Hungarian-American mathematician. Born 1903 in Budapest to a Jewish family. Pioneer of computing, game theory, quantum mechanics. Key contributor to Manhattan Project. Died 1957.

noam-chomsky-sci.name: Noam Chomsky
noam-chomsky-sci.bio: American linguist and political activist. Born 1928 in Philadelphia to a Jewish family. "Father of modern linguistics." Prominent critic of US foreign policy and Israeli policy.

albert-sabin.name: Albert Sabin
albert-sabin.bio: Polish-American medical researcher. Developed the oral polio vaccine. Born 1906 in Białystok, Poland, to a Jewish family. Emigrated to US in 1921. Died 1993.

carl-sagan.name: Carl Sagan
carl-sagan.bio: American astronomer and science communicator. Born 1934 in Brooklyn to a Jewish family. Created "Cosmos" TV series. Pioneer in exobiology. Died 1996.

steven-weinberg.name: Steven Weinberg
steven-weinberg.bio: American theoretical physicist. Nobel Prize in Physics (1979). Born 1933 to a Jewish family in New York. Key contributor to electroweak unification. Died 2021.

daniel-kahneman.name: Daniel Kahneman
daniel-kahneman.bio: Israeli-American psychologist. Nobel Prize in Economics (2002). Born 1934 in Tel Aviv to a Jewish family from Lithuania. Pioneer of behavioral economics. Author of "Thinking, Fast and Slow." Died 2024.

edward-teller.name: Edward Teller
edward-teller.bio: Hungarian-American theoretical physicist. Known as the "Father of the Hydrogen Bomb." Born 1908 in Budapest to a Jewish family. Co-founded Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory. Died 2003.

hyman-rickover.name: Hyman G. Rickover
hyman-rickover.bio: American admiral. "Father of the Nuclear Navy." Born 1900 in Maków Mazowiecki, Poland, to a Jewish family. Died 1986. Longest-serving naval officer in US history.

ruth-bader-ginsburg-sci.name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
ruth-bader-ginsburg-sci.bio: American jurist. US Supreme Court Justice (1993-2020). Born 1933 in Brooklyn to a Jewish family. Pioneer of gender equality litigation. Died 2020. Cultural icon "Notorious RBG."

alan-dershowitz-sci.name: Alan Dershowitz
alan-dershowitz-sci.bio: American lawyer and legal scholar. Felix Frankfurter Professor of Law Emeritus at Harvard. Born 1938 in Brooklyn to an Orthodox Jewish family. Controversial figure in Epstein case defense.

lawrence-tribe.name: Laurence Tribe
lawrence-tribe.bio: American legal scholar. Carl M. Loeb University Professor Emeritus at Harvard Law School. Born 1941 in Shanghai to Jewish refugees. Leading liberal constitutional law scholar.

martin-nowak-harvard.name: Martin Nowak
martin-nowak-harvard.bio: Austrian-American mathematician and biologist who directs the Program for Evolutionary Dynamics at Harvard. Epstein was the program's founding donor and visited Nowak's office frequently.

affiliations.role: Harvard evolutionary biologist whose Program for Evolutionary Dynamics received $6.5 million from Epstein

alan-dershowitz-harvard.name: Alan Dershowitz
alan-dershowitz-harvard.bio: High-profile appellate lawyer and Harvard Law professor for over 50 years. Key member of Epstein's legal defense team that negotiated the controversial 2008 non-prosecution agreement.

affiliations.role: Harvard Law School professor emeritus who served on Epstein's defense team

drew-faust-harvard.name: Drew Gilpin Faust
drew-faust-harvard.bio: Historian and 28th president of Harvard. Under her leadership, Harvard continued to accept donations from Epstein after his 2008 sex offense conviction.

affiliations.role: Harvard president (2007-2018) who oversaw the period when the university accepted Epstein gifts after his conviction

stephen-kosslyn-harvard.name: Stephen Kosslyn
stephen-kosslyn-harvard.bio: Cognitive neuroscientist and former dean of social science at Harvard. Accepted research funding from Epstein and was identified in Harvard's 2020 internal review as having significant contact with Epstein.

affiliations.role: Former Harvard psychology dean who accepted Epstein research funding and visited Epstein's homes

robert-trivers-harvard.name: Robert Trivers
robert-trivers-harvard.bio: Renowned evolutionary biologist who received funding through the Jeffrey Epstein VI Foundation. He visited Epstein's island and attended events at his Manhattan townhouse.

affiliations.role: Evolutionary biologist who received Epstein research funding and visited his Virgin Islands property

les-wexner-vs.name: Les Wexner
les-wexner-vs.bio: American billionaire who built Victoria's Secret into a global brand. Granted Epstein power of attorney over his finances and transferred a $77 million Manhattan townhouse to him.

affiliations.role: Founder of L Brands and Epstein's only known major financial patron who gave him sweeping power of attorney

ed-razek-vs.name: Ed Razek
ed-razek-vs.bio: Longtime L Brands executive who oversaw Victoria's Secret marketing including the Angels fashion show. The VS brand was leveraged by Epstein to approach young women by posing as talent scouts.

affiliations.role: L Brands chief marketing officer whose Victoria's Secret brand was exploited by Epstein to approach young women

maria-farmer-vs.name: Maria Farmer
maria-farmer-vs.bio: Artist who was sexually assaulted by Epstein and Maxwell at Les Wexner's Ohio compound in 1996. She filed an FBI complaint in 1996 that was not pursued for years.

affiliations.role: One of the first Epstein accusers who was assaulted at Wexner's Ohio estate in 1996

alicia-arden-vs.name: Alicia Arden
alicia-arden-vs.bio: Filed a police report with Santa Monica PD in 1997 alleging Epstein groped her during what was presented as a modeling audition connected to Victoria's Secret.

affiliations.role: Aspiring model who filed a 1997 police report alleging Epstein groped her while using a talent scout pretense

robert-morosky-vs.name: Robert Morosky
robert-morosky-vs.bio: Served as Vice Chairman of The Limited. His departure from the company reportedly coincided with Epstein's increasing control over Wexner's business affairs.

affiliations.role: Former Vice Chairman of The Limited whose departure coincided with Epstein's growing influence over Wexner

marie-villafana-fbi.name: A. Marie Villafana
marie-villafana-fbi.bio: A. Marie Villafana was the Assistant US Attorney who worked with FBI agents and drafted a 53-page federal indictment against Epstein that was shelved when the NPA was negotiated.

affiliations.role: AUSA who drafted a 53-page federal indictment that was shelved when the NPA was negotiated

julie-k-brown-fbi.name: Julie K. Brown
julie-k-brown-fbi.bio: Julie K. Brown is a Miami Herald investigative reporter whose 'Perversion of Justice' series effectively forced the FBI to reopen the Epstein case in 2018-2019.

affiliations.role: Miami Herald reporter whose 'Perversion of Justice' series effectively forced the FBI to reopen the case

william-sweeney-jr.name: William Sweeney Jr.
william-sweeney-jr.bio: William Sweeney Jr. was the FBI Assistant Director in Charge of the New York Field Office who led the 2019 arrest operation and spoke at the press conference.

affiliations.role: FBI Assistant Director in Charge of the NY Field Office who led the 2019 arrest operation

michael-reiter-fbi.name: Michael Reiter
michael-reiter-fbi.bio: Michael Reiter was the Palm Beach Police Chief who referred the case to the FBI after the state attorney downgraded charges.

affiliations.role: Palm Beach Police Chief who referred the case to the FBI after state attorney downgraded charges

courtney-wild-fbi.name: Courtney Wild
courtney-wild-fbi.bio: Courtney Wild is an Epstein victim whose CVRA legal challenge in federal court helped expose failures in the original FBI/DOJ handling.

affiliations.role: Epstein victim whose CVRA legal challenge helped expose failures in original FBI/DOJ handling

alex-rossmiller.name: Alex Rossmiller
alex-rossmiller.bio: Alex Rossmiller was an SDNY Assistant US Attorney who served on the prosecution team for both the Epstein and Maxwell cases.

affiliations.role: SDNY AUSA who served on the prosecution team for Epstein and Maxwell cases

alison-moe.name: Alison Moe
alison-moe.bio: Alison Moe was an SDNY prosecutor who delivered a powerful statement at Epstein's bail hearing detailing the danger he posed.

affiliations.role: SDNY prosecutor who delivered a powerful statement at Epstein's bail hearing

william-sweeney-jr-sdny.name: William Sweeney Jr.
william-sweeney-jr-sdny.bio: William Sweeney Jr. was the FBI Assistant Director in Charge of the NY Field Office who coordinated with SDNY on Epstein's arrest at Teterboro Airport.

affiliations.role: FBI AD who coordinated with SDNY on Epstein's arrest at Teterboro Airport

nicholas-tartaglione.name: Nicholas Tartaglione
nicholas-tartaglione.bio: Nicholas Tartaglione was a former Briarcliff Manor police officer charged with quadruple murder. He was Epstein's cellmate before being abruptly transferred days before Epstein's death.

affiliations.role: Former police officer charged with quadruple murder; was Epstein's cellmate before being transferred days before his death

william-barr-mcc.name: William Barr
william-barr-mcc.bio: William Barr was US Attorney General who ordered a DOJ/BOP investigation into Epstein's death and publicly stated security cameras had malfunctioned.

affiliations.role: US Attorney General who ordered DOJ/BOP investigation into Epstein's death

lamine-ndiaye.name: Lamine N'Diaye
lamine-ndiaye.bio: Lamine N'Diaye was the warden of MCC New York who was reassigned after Epstein's death as part of administrative fallout.

affiliations.role: Warden of MCC New York who was reassigned after Epstein's death

donald-barr-dalton.name: Donald Barr
donald-barr-dalton.bio: Educator and former OSS intelligence officer who served as headmaster of the Dalton School. He hired Epstein to teach calculus and physics in 1974. Father of William Barr, who later served as US Attorney General.

affiliations.role: Dalton School headmaster who hired the 20-year-old Epstein to teach math despite his lack of a college degree

william-barr-dalton.name: William Barr
william-barr-dalton.bio: Served as US Attorney General under Presidents George H.W. Bush and Donald Trump. He was AG during Epstein's arrest, imprisonment, and death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in August 2019.

affiliations.role: Donald Barr's son and US Attorney General during Epstein's 2019 arrest and death in federal custody

alan-greenberg-dalton.name: Alan 'Ace' Greenberg
alan-greenberg-dalton.bio: Legendary Wall Street trader who led Bear Stearns for decades. He hired Epstein as a junior trader at the firm based on recommendations from wealthy Dalton School parents.

affiliations.role: Bear Stearns chairman who hired Epstein in 1976 based on recommendations from wealthy Dalton families

barry-krischer-pbpd.name: Barry Krischer
barry-krischer-pbpd.bio: Barry Krischer was the Palm Beach County State Attorney who took the case to grand jury but obtained only a single solicitation charge, frustrating police investigators.

affiliations.role: Palm Beach County State Attorney who obtained only a single solicitation charge despite police evidence

michele-pagan.name: Michele Pagan
michele-pagan.bio: Michele Pagan was a Palm Beach Police detective involved in victim interviews and evidence collection in the Epstein investigation.

affiliations.role: Palm Beach Police detective involved in victim interviews and evidence collection

alison-arden.name: Alison Arden
alison-arden.bio: Alison Arden was an aspiring model who filed a 1997 police report (with Santa Monica PD) that Epstein groped her. It was one of the earliest known reports.

affiliations.role: Aspiring model who filed one of the earliest known police reports about Epstein in 1997

denise-george-usvi.name: Denise George
denise-george-usvi.bio: Served as USVI Attorney General and filed a groundbreaking civil enforcement action against Epstein's estate and JPMorgan Chase. She was fired by Governor Albert Bryan Jr. reportedly for filing the JPMorgan suit without approval.

affiliations.role: USVI Attorney General who filed landmark civil suits against Epstein's estate and JPMorgan Chase

albert-bryan-jr-usvi.name: Albert Bryan Jr.
albert-bryan-jr-usvi.bio: Governor of the US Virgin Islands who fired AG Denise George in January 2023 shortly after she filed the $190 million lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase.

affiliations.role: USVI Governor who fired AG Denise George after she filed the JPMorgan Chase lawsuit

cecile-de-jongh-usvi.name: Cecile de Jongh
cecile-de-jongh-usvi.bio: Wife of former USVI Governor John de Jongh Jr. Court documents revealed she was employed by Epstein as an administrative assistant at his office on St. Thomas.

affiliations.role: Wife of former USVI Governor John de Jongh Jr. who was employed by Epstein on St. Thomas

stephen-deckoff-usvi.name: Stephen Deckoff
stephen-deckoff-usvi.bio: Founder of Black Diamond Capital Management. He purchased Little St. James and Great St. James islands from Epstein's estate for approximately $60 million in 2023.

affiliations.role: Billionaire financier who purchased Epstein's two Virgin Islands properties for approximately $60 million in 2023

ariel-smith-usvi.name: Ariel Smith
ariel-smith-usvi.bio: Served as USVI Acting AG after Denise George's firing. She continued the litigation, helping secure a $105 million settlement with the Epstein estate and a $75 million settlement with JPMorgan Chase.

affiliations.role: USVI Acting AG who continued Epstein-related litigation after Denise George's termination

mark-middleton.name: Mark Middleton
mark-middleton.bio: Mark Middleton served as Special Assistant to President Clinton and arranged at least three Epstein visits to the White House in the 1990s according to visitor logs obtained via FOIA.

affiliations.role: Special Assistant to President Clinton who arranged at least three Epstein visits to the White House in the 1990s

kevin-spacey-clinton.name: Kevin Spacey
kevin-spacey-clinton.bio: Kevin Spacey accompanied Clinton on Epstein's jet on a 2002 trip to Africa per flight logs. Has faced separate sexual misconduct allegations.

affiliations.role: Actor who accompanied Clinton on Epstein's jet on a 2002 trip to Africa

george-houraney.name: George Houraney
george-houraney.bio: George Houraney organized a 'calendar girls' event at Mar-a-Lago in 1992 attended only by Trump and Epstein. He warned Trump about Epstein's behavior with women.

affiliations.role: Florida businessman who organized a 'calendar girls' event at Mar-a-Lago in 1992 attended only by Trump and Epstein

virginia-giuffre-maralago.name: Virginia Giuffre
virginia-giuffre-maralago.bio: Virginia Giuffre was recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell from Mar-a-Lago where Giuffre worked as a spa attendant at age 16. She became a key accuser in the Epstein case.

affiliations.role: Recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell from Mar-a-Lago where she worked as a spa attendant at age 16

bradley-edwards.name: Bradley Edwards
